title: Reduce print font sizes so the report card fits on a single A4 landscape page

requirements.text: Adjust print-specific typography and spacing so the entire report card reliably fits on a single A4 landscape page by making fonts smaller (and tightening vertical spacing where needed) without changing the table structure or calculations.

quotes: Why are you facing the problem just make the fonts small so that everything can fit in a single page

acceptanceCriteria: When using the browser Print dialog, the report card prints on exactly one A4 landscape page (no second page).
Printed output is not clipped on any edge; all sections (header, scholastic table, co-scholastic fields, attendance/result/remarks, signatures) remain visible.
Font sizes in print are reduced compared to on-screen where needed, while keeping the layout readable and visually consistent with the existing report-card style.
No changes to marks calculations, subject rows, export/import/reset behavior, or non-print on-screen layout besides any necessary print-only adjustments.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Retrying or diagnosing deployment/build pipeline errors.
